ALICE COOPER - THE LAST TEMPTATION

- The Last Temptation album in mp3 format.



"This is the 'compleat' edition of Neil Gaiman's three part graphic novel collaboration with Alice Cooper. It is a brilliant, and occasionally slightly disturbing, story of a boy called Steven and the showman of a theatre 'that isn't there until sunset'. This accompanies the Alice Cooper concept album of the same name and fills in some of the gaps in the story not in the songs." - Amazon.
These comic books were originally published by Marvel Comics as a three-issue miniseries,
the first of which came with The Last Temptation album.

Bueno esta es una historia bastante interesante y unica para los amantes de Alice Cooper y sus terrorificas presentanciones; espero les guste y gracias a quien en su momento se tomo la molestia de hacer la traduccion y de subirlo a Internet."



The Album
The Last Temptation was the 1994 concept album by rock singer, Alice Cooper. It centred around a boy named Steven (also the name of the protagonist in Cooper's earlier work, Welcome to My Nightmare), and a mysterious showman. The showman, with apparent supernatural abilities, attempted with the use of twisted versions of morality plays to persuade Steven to join his travelling show, "The Theatre Of The Real - The Grand-est Guignol!", where he would "never grow up". - Wikipedia
"Alice Cooper goes with a little less crunch on this CD and releases a great effort. The songs are very modern and cynical and sometimes funny. Cooper always has some of the best lyrics and keeps the fans intrigued." - Chris Kaiser
The album is included here in mp3 format (192 kbps).
